description:
I installed this via Discover on Lubuntu 24.10 (Oracular Oriole). I ran with 
default settings and it produced results. But, then I tried to change the 
Monte Carlo setting for maximum Market Rate return and it hung, my 
processor temp started climbing. Fortunately it didn't try to run on all
cores (I would think it should, but, in this failure mode I could at least kill
it before it caused problems). Anyway, definitely needs more work. Would
be a nice app to have though.
